openaiSpec.name: mboum_crypto_data
openaiSpec.description: Access MBOUM's cryptocurrency data API for detailed information on cryptocurrencies, including quotes, historical data, market stats, and exchange information. Use this plugin when you need specific information about cryptocurrencies rather than traditional stocks.

requestDetails.description: An object containing the target Mboum cryptocurrency data endpoint and its specific parameters.

endpoint.description: The specific Mboum API endpoint for cryptocurrency data. Select the most appropriate endpoint based on the user's request.

queryParams.description: Parameters required for the selected endpoint. Different endpoints need different parameters.

period.description: Time period for historical data (required for 'crypto_history' and 'crypto_history_v2' endpoints).

interval.description: Time interval for historical data (required for 'crypto_history' and 'crypto_history_v2' endpoints).

start.description: Start date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for 'crypto_history' and 'crypto_history_v2' endpoints).

end.description: End date for historical data in YYYY-MM-DD format (optional for 'crypto_history' and 'crypto_history_v2' endpoints).

exchange.description: Specific exchange to filter data (optional for 'crypto_markets' endpoint).

limit.description: Limit number of results (optional for 'crypto_exchanges' and 'crypto_markets' endpoints).

page.description: Page number for paginated results (optional for 'crypto_exchanges' and 'crypto_markets' endpoints).
